channel.description: Enable email magic links during sign-in Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 268 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Note: Doc is for embedded solutions Links to original docs: Email Magic Links overview: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/email-magic-links-overview/aspnet/main/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.
